fields.label: What type of non-residential structure is this?
Why is this residential structure not eligible?
Why is this Non-Residential structure eligible?

fields.hint: What is the name of the location (zone) this structure is in?
Select the spray operator code who collected data against this structure

v_required.err: Please enter the spray operator code

v_numeric.err: Please enter a number

fields.label: Were any rooms in this structure sprayed

v_numeric.err: Number of eligible rooms must be a number

v_numeric_integer.err: Number of eligible rooms must be a whole number

v_min.err: Number of eligible rooms must be greater than or equal to 0

fields.hint: Number of rooms sprayed in TOTAL

v_required.err: Please specify number of rooms sprayed

v_numeric.err: Number of rooms sprayed must be a number

v_numeric_integer.err: Number of rooms sprayed must be a whole number

v_min.err: Number of eligible rooms must be greater than or equal to 0

v_relative_max.err: Number of rooms sprayed cannot be greater than number of eligible rooms.

fields.text: If this is a mop-up or revisit, please record TOTAL rooms sprayed

fields.label: Main reason why some ELIGIBLE rooms in this structure were not sprayed?

v_numeric.err: Male population must be a number

v_numeric_integer.err: Male population must be a whole number

v_min.err: Male population must be greater than or equal to 0

v_max.err: Male population must be less than 20

v_numeric.err: Female population must be a number

v_numeric_integer.err: Female population must be a whole number

v_min.err: Female population must be greater than or equal to 0

v_max.err: Female population must be less than 20

fields.label: Click the checkbox to approve the total population.

fields.text: You can not enter a population of 0 for a sprayed structure

v_numeric.err: Pregnant Women must be a number

v_numeric_integer.err: Pregnant Women must be a whole number

v_min.err: Pregnant Women must be greater than or equal to 0

v_relative_max.err: Pregnant Women must be less than female population

v_numeric.err: Children <5 years must be a number

v_numeric_integer.err: Children <5 years must be a whole number

v_min.err: Children <5 years must be greater than or equal to 0

fields.text: Children <5 years must be less than Total Population AND Less than the Total Population minus Pregnant Women

v_required.err: Total Number of Nets Available is mandatory

v_numeric.err: Total Number of Nets Available must be a number

v_numeric_integer.err: Total Number of Nets Available must be a whole number

v_min.err: Total Number of Nets Available must be greater than or equal to 0

fields.hint: Total Number of Nets Hanging and in Use

v_required.err: Total Number of Nets Hanging and in Use is mandatory

v_numeric.err: Total Number of Nets Hanging and in Use must be a number

v_numeric_integer.err: Total Number of Nets Hanging and in Use must be a whole number

v_min.err: Total Number of Nets Hanging and in Use must be greater than or equal to 0

fields.text: Total Number of Nets Hanging and in Use must be less than or equal to the total population (females + males). Also, it must be less than total available nets.

fields.hint: Total Number of Residents Sleeping Under Nets

v_required.err: Total Number of Residents Sleeping Under Nets is mandatory

v_numeric.err: Total Number of Residents Sleeping Under Nets must be a number

v_numeric_integer.err: Total Number of Residents Sleeping Under Nets must be a whole number

v_min.err: Total Number of Residents Sleeping Under Nets must be greater than or equal to 0

fields.text: Total Number of Residents Sleeping Under Nets must be equal to or less than Total Population AND equal to or more than Total Nets in Use.

fields.hint: Number of Pregnant Women Sleeping Under Net

v_required.err: Number of Pregnant Women Sleeping Under Net is mandatory

v_numeric.err: Number of Pregnant Women Sleeping Under Net must be a number

v_numeric_integer.err: Number of Pregnant Women Sleeping Under Net must be a whole number

v_min.err: Number of Pregnant Women Sleeping Under Net must be greater than or equal to 0

fields.text: Number of Pregnant Women Sleeping Under Net must be equal or less than Children <5 years and Total Population Sleeping Under Nets

fields.hint: Number of Children Under 5 Yrs Sleeping Under Net

v_required.err: Number of Children Under 5 Yrs Sleeping Under Net is mandatory

v_numeric.err: Number of Children Under 5 Yrs Sleeping Under Net must be a number

v_numeric_integer.err: Number of Children Under 5 Yrs Sleeping Under Net must be a whole number

v_min.err: Number of Children Under 5 Yrs Sleeping Under Net must be greater than or equal to 0

fields.text: Number of Children Under 5 Yrs Sleeping Under Net must be equal or less than Children <5 years and Total Population Sleeping Under Nets
